'''''Prevention Measures''''' is a [[Random Event]] World Quest that can occur while exploring the world.

==Steps==
# Defeat all enemies

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(When triggering the quest)
:'''Paimon:''' What could those hilichurls be digging for?
:'''Paimon:''' {{Traveler}}, let's go fend them off!
{{Dialogue End}}
